markdown: ITC Limited REPORT AND ACCOUNTS 2013 <::A multi-panel image showing various retail displays of ITC products and shoppers. The top panel features a display of "Engage" deo sprays, with promotional images of couples in the background. The middle panel shows shelves stocked with "Vivel" products, including bottles and smaller sachets, with text highlighting "10X Vitamin E benefit at the cell level". The bottom left panel displays "Fiama" products, featuring a large cutout of a woman's face and "25g FREE" promotions. The bottom right panel shows a man and a woman walking in a retail environment, carrying shopping bags.: figure::> This supply chain infrastructure has reinforced its competitive capability significantly to ensure visibility, availability and freshness. ITC's brands are today available in more than 1000 Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) at nearly 6 million retail outlets in the country. ITC's formidable distribution organisation directly services more than 2 million of these retail outlets. This elaborate network provides significant sustainable livelihoods. Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/snbx0223
